aboutHeadline: Blending High-Impact Visuals with Production-Ready Sound.
aboutBody: I am Jeven, a multidisciplinary creative specializing first in Graphic Design. I am a recent graduate from OCAD University. I love crafting compelling brand identities, album art, and working with clients to make their visions come to life. My secondary focus is on music production, in which I engineer and produce beats for various artists. This combination offers a unique and cohesive creative package for my clients.
